title: SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUT
content:
0x93D9BD300D7789E50x142606BD// SetVehicleDoorShut
void SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUT(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex, BOOL closeInstantly);Parameters:vehicle: Vehicle.doorIndex: Index of the door you want to close.closeInstantly: Whether the doors close instantly.Sets the specified door index shut on the passed vehicle.enum eDoorId
{
	VEH_EXT_DOOR_DSIDE_F = 0,
	VEH_EXT_DOOR_DSIDE_R = 1,
	VEH_EXT_DOOR_PSIDE_F = 2,
	VEH_EXT_DOOR_PSIDE_R = 3,
	VEH_EXT_BONNET = 4,
	VEH_EXT_BOOT = 5,
	// 0x872E72B8 = 0xFFFFFFFF,
}
Examples:Lualocal Vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
for i = 0, 5 do
  SetVehicleDoorShut(Vehicle, i, false) -- will close all doors from 0-5
end
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleDoorShut
void SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUT(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex, BOOL closeInstantly);

local Vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
for i = 0, 5 do
  SetVehicleDoorShut(Vehicle, i, false) -- will close all doors from 0-5
end
